entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
